name: admin
content:
admin noun
(ORGANIZING TASKS)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] short for
administration : arrangements and tasks needed to control the operation of a plan, an organization, a person's activities, etc.: Let's skip through the boring admin first: we have to fill out this form. Over 100 people are employed by the college as teaching staff or in admin.
More examplesFewer examplesI had some personal admin to do, like paying bills and answering messages.The costs of admin account for less than 0.15% of the charges paid by the client.

admin noun
(PERSON)
[ C ]
  computing
  specialized short for
administrator : a person who is in charge of the operation of a network of computers, a website, a group of computer users, etc., and is able to make changes to it: Only admins can add people to the group chat or change the name of the group. a network/server/site/domain admin I have full admin rights on the network.
More examplesFewer examplesI logged on as an admin using the password provided.I think this is an essential resource for every IT admin.Let the network admin know if the system is running slow.Users cannot add records to the database unless they are domain admins.You can log on remotely if you have admin privileges.

short for
administrative : relating to the arrangements and tasks needed to control the operation of a plan, an organization, a person's activities, etc.: He's an admin assistant at a PR firm. They said the discrepancy in the accounts was simply an admin error. admin staff/jobs/duties/tasks admin costs/expenses/fees
More examplesFewer examplesHigher admin costs were offset by higher sales.Tickets cost $15 each plus a small admin fee.I spent the morning doing a few admin tasks.The requirement to register imposes an additional admin burden on members.

short for administration: the activities involved in managing or organizing a business or other organization: I don't want my best salespeople spending all their time doing admin. an admin error an admin fee/charge an admin job
short for administration: the part of a business or other organization that manages or organizes its activities: There has been the occasional disagreement between admin and sales. the admin department
